name: Amazons
description: Amazons have long been a fan favourite in Blood Bowl â€“ acrobatic athletes honed by their jungle home, who can compete against the very best teams in the game. Their exceptional blend of agility, tactical prowess, and penchant for violence means they are ideally suited for success on the gridiron!

name: Chaos Chosen
limit: *A Chaos Choosen team may include a single Big Guy from the above

name: Old World Alliance
description: The cities of the Old World are bustling metropoles, populated by all manner of different races. From Kislev in the cold north, to Estalia in the sweltering south, Humans build their homes, and to these flock Dwarfs, Halflings and more.

name: Orc
description: Orcs have been playing Blood Bowl since the game was invented, and Orc teams such as the GougedEye and Severed Heads are amongst the best in the league. Orc teams are tough and hard-hitting, grinding down the oppositionâ€™s line to create gaps for their excellent Orc Blitzers to exploit.

name: Shambling Undead
description: In the Old World the dead do not rest easy. Vampires lurk in haunted castles, Necromancers seek to escape death by searching for forbidden knowledge, the Liche-lords rule over legions of corpses, and on the Blood Bowl field players who died long ago return to the scenes of their former glory and play Blood Bowl once againâ€¦
